Before Christ went to His final conflict with the powers of darkness, He lifted up His eyes to heaven and 
                                                                           323
prayed for His disciples. He said, "I pray not that Thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that Thou shouldest keep them from the evil. They are not of the world, even as I am not of the world. Sanctify them through Thy truth: Thy word is truth." John 17:15-17.
